description: EquiStar is the first NFT Collection made by EstarGames, on the Elrond blockchain. This collection consists of 10010 NFTs divided into 5 rarities (Common, Rare, Ultra rare, Epic, and Legendary), and is based on cards with different characteristics (speed, luck, endurance, and agility) that give you an advantage over your opponents in the horse races that will take place in the game with the same name.
